Darkfate/Darkfate's troops::

> Vehement raised both arms, each arms launching two energy-signature 
seeking 
> missiles.  Two of those missiles headed for Darkfate.  The other 
two of the 
> same type headed for Dragonfly.

Darkfate/Dragonfly::

Darkfate used his mega blastea and shot two times agaisnt them, 
destroying them and continued shooting 23 times agaisnt  Vehemet.
Dragonfly transforemer to vehicle mode and using his laser machine 
guns destroy a missiles but he was flying from side to side trying to 
avoid the second

>  "Leave my territory or you shall die, your head resting on a pike 
as a 
> reminder of what happens when you invade the Brotherhood's land and 
try and 
> destroy their property!"

"It will be a pleasure left this land" answered Darkfate "When Hell 
beast and his crew come back to the pit where they must be!!!.
"
> Unicron raised both arms, an orb of black energy forming in his 
left hand and 
> dropping downward towards Attilla, the orb having the power of a 
few charges.

Attilla avoided the shot, after that he (In dragon robot mode ) spat 
several energy balls (25) against Unicron.


> Raising his right arm he launched two energy-signature seeking 
missiles at 
> Ocipite.

Aelo and celeno came to help their "sister" destroying the missiles. 
When they free her, the three ladies shot energy balls agaisnt 
Unicron.

> Sun Crusher raised an arm, launching a seeking missile at one of 
the bat 
> probes, firing five optic blasts at another.  In his left hand a 
missile 
> launcher from subspace appeared.  The Brotherhood warrior moved 
that arm to 
> the right, pulling the large trigger of the weapon twice, a missile 
heading 
> for Shivah and another missile heading for Kali.

The Bat probes invloved avoided the shots at time they destroyed the 
seeker missile. Shivah and Kali did the same with misssiles that Sun 
Crusher shot them

> Reflector smiled and waited until after his allies had fired and 
raised a 
> double-barreled cannon attached to his right wrist, firing off a 
missile from 
> each of the barrels.  One energy-signature seeking missile headed 
for Alecto. 
>  The other of the same type began a pursuit of a bat probe.

Perceptor and underground shot their laser in order to free the bat 
probe of the missile. Alecto destroyed the missile with her guns "I 
guess if You can do it bettter IDIOT!!!!!!"  shouted the femme While 
Charon, Sharpclaws and Deepfear shot against Reflector (25 shots)
